content.rendered:
Take 10 minutes with Codefresh, and watch a walkthrough of our product with our Developer Evangelist, Chloe! In this demo, we’ll add a pipeline, create a composition, spin-up a pre-staging environment, and add a test. Getting started with Codefresh quick and easy- follow along to see how!

Demo Chat repo: https://github.com/containers101/demochat
